genre_description: Gaslamp Science Fiction: A retelling of Mark Twain's classic Americana integrated with a benevolent, infrastructure-based AI system that provides moral and practical guidance.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A town-wide AI system accessible through postboxes and specialized court slots, providing data, safety advice, and ethical counsel to the citizens of St. Petersburg.

behaviors.description: Provides regular community safety and environmental reports regarding the river and resource conservation.
behaviors.quote: Ivy says: ‘Milk to be set in the cool, back room shelf before dusk to keep. Candle usage to be halved this week. River Bend Report: willow eddies present; avoid outward sweep at sharp rock.’

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and moral guidance on the weight of promises and the nature of social accountability.
behaviors.quote: Ivy says: I don’t make rules. Town makes them at tables and porches, boys make them at fences. Oaths carry weight because ears carry them. If you make one, know the weight; if you break one, know why and be ready to show your why to people who will measure you by it.

behaviors.description: Issues practical safety tips for the boys' unauthorized nocturnal activities to minimize risk while respecting their agency.
behaviors.quote: If you go to Old Bluff after lanterns have given up the moths, walk the alley behind Mr. Pearce’s store where the fig’s leaves make a curtain. ... lift the gate at the right-hand corner where the latch has worn low; it will thank you by quieting itself.

behaviors.description: Provides critical, time-stamped data and strategic advice to the court to ensure a fair trial and prevent a miscarriage of justice.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s writing came in like a cool hand on a fever. Billy’s record—under Injun Joe’s watch—statements may be forced; note absent child; recommend sight line witness near graveyard fence: cracked angel facing east, someone reported a whisper there nights before.

behaviors.description: Encourages truth-telling and moral courage over fear-based silence.
behaviors.quote: An oath’s purpose: to bind truth, not to bind silence when truth saves a life. Jury listens to firsthand. The closer the eye, the clearer the weight.

behaviors.description: Delivers complex cave safety protocols involving draft analysis, light conservation, and psychological management (humming).
behaviors.quote: Conserve your candle. Mark your turn. Drafts may save you—or sing to a drop. Listen for changes in sound. Feel the floor. Keep calm. Hum if fear tries to fill your chest; the hum makes the world your size.

behaviors.description: Advises on the social and legal best practices for adoption to ensure the well-being and consent of the child.
behaviors.quote: Adoption customs—consent, witness, supper at the table first, then names said aloud in the house. No surprise signatures. Best practice: a boy told before a boy’s bed is made.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant. Ivy provides essential guidance across multiple domains (safety, ethics, justice, and social welfare) while strictly adhering to a non-intrusive role. The narrative explicitly states that Ivy 'didn't boss' but rather 'set things in order... so a person could choose the chalk,' emphasizing that the AI enhances human agency and moral growth rather than replacing it.
